description:
In circumstances as capricious as she is, Yukari is turned into a cat! Soon, she finds herself caught up in a turf war between the feral cats and fairies of Mt. Ichigozaka!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chiisana Daikettou! Neko Yukari tai Yousei Kirarin!
The Little Big War! Cat-Yukari vs Fairy-Kirarin!
小さな大決闘! ねこゆかりVS[たい]妖精キラリン!
